experience.title: Digital Design Engineer
experience.description: - Part of BMS (Battery Management System) team- Worked on SystemC modelling of SPI module- Acted as design owner of communication blocks I2C, SPI and UART. Resolved bugs and provided support to Verification team.- Worked on design & implementation of PMU (Power Management Unit). Developed algorithms for Power Management in a dual processor chip.

projects: [{"title":"Term Project - Comb Filter Design using PSO Algorithm","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"- Designed an FIR Comb Filter in Matlab using PSO(ParticleSwarmOptimization) algorithm. Further, the number of bits for fixed-point representation was also decided based on the error between the frequency response.- The filter was used to remove AC background noise from the recorded speech of the human voice."},{"title":"RHBD(Radiation Hardening by Design) Serial Communication","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"- Worked on Serial Link blocks required for Data Communication.- Designed a digital VCDL(Voltage Controlled Delay Loop) in Cadence Virtuoso using current starved inverter elements. And a decoding logic to control the delay amount.- Engineered Radiation Hardened topologies of VCO(Voltage Controlled Oscillator), simulated in Cadence Virtuoso. Current strikes were simulated at various nodes to check for radiation insensitivity."},{"title":"Prediction Using Machine Learning","start_date":"Jun 2018","end_date":"Jul 2018","description":"-University Admission:- Predicting the scope of admission of an individual into a university-based on certain parameters such as \"GRE score\", \"TOEFL score\", \"University Ranking\", \"CGPA score\" etc.-Predicting Ratings of Various Play Store Apps based on data available.Two methods were applied; Linear Regression(Without Normalization) and Linear Regression WIth Normalization"}]
